meta.title: Sperminfo - Professional Male Reproductive Medicine Reagents
meta.description: Sperminfo specializes in high-quality male reproductive health testing reagents. Professional sperm DNA fragmentation, morphology staining, MAR test, and vitality analysis kits for medical laboratories worldwide.

hero.title: Professional Solutions for Reproductive Health
hero.description: As specialists in andrology diagnostics, we offer premium laboratory reagents that bridge the gap between scientific research and accurate clinical outcomes, supporting the global medical community.

about.title: About Sperminfo
about.tagline: Advancing the Future of Male Reproductive Diagnostics
about.subtitle: Precision in Every Drop, Confidence in Every Result
about.description: Sperminfo is a premier biotech enterprise specializing in male reproductive health. We are dedicated to empowering medical institutions and clinical laboratories worldwide with high-precision diagnostic reagents. Driven by a decade and a half of technical expertise and a relentless pursuit of excellence, we ensure that our products not only meet but set the benchmark for international medical standards. From specialized R&D to global OEM solutions, Sperminfo is your trusted partner in semen analysis.

quality.title: Uncompromising Quality Control
quality.desc: Validated by global clinical leaders and fully compliant with WHO 6th Edition standards, ensuring the highest level of diagnostic accuracy.

expertise.title: Decades of Expertise
expertise.desc: Our R&D team comprises elite medical technology experts with over 15 years of experience in reproductive medicine and biochemistry.

reliability.title: Global Reliability & Scale
reliability.desc: With a robust supply chain and a commitment to reliability, we also provide seamless OEM/ODM services, supporting the reproductive health goals of partners across the globe.

scd_assay.name: Sperm DNA Fragmentation (SCD assay)
scd_assay.desc: Sperm Chromatin Dispersion Assay, used to evaluate sperm DNA integrity and provide important evidence for infertility diagnosis
scd_assay.alt: Sperm DNA Fragmentation SCD assay kit for laboratory testing

morphology.name: Pre-stained Sperm Morphology Quick Staining
morphology.desc: Improved Diff-Quik sperm staining solution, used for sperm morphological analysis to assess sperm quality
morphology.alt: Pre-stained Sperm Morphology Quick Staining kit for laboratory analysis

mar_test.name: Sperm MAR test
mar_test.desc: To detect anti-sperm antibodies (ASABs) in semen (Mixed Antiglobulin Reaction)
mar_test.alt: Sperm MAR test kit for detecting anti-sperm antibodies

vitality.name: Sperm Vitality Staining
vitality.desc: To assess the percentage of live sperm in semen

leukocyte.name: Sperm Leukocyte Staining
leukocyte.desc: To detect white blood cells (leukocytes) in semen

liquefaction.name: Semen Liquefaction Solution
liquefaction.desc: Promote liquefy semen more rapidly and uniformly

technology.title: Technical Excellence
technology.tagline: Where Cutting-Edge Science Meets Clinical Precision

molecular.title: High-Fidelity Molecular Diagnostics
molecular.desc: By leveraging advanced molecular biology platforms, we deliver superior diagnostic sensitivity and specificity, ensuring that every test result is both accurate and reproducible.

who.title: WHO 6th Edition Gold Standard
who.desc: Our production lines operate under rigorous standardized protocols in full compliance with the latest WHO 6th Edition benchmarks, guaranteeing uncompromising batch-to-batch consistency.

rd.title: Future-Ready R&D Pipeline
rd.desc: Innovation is our core driver. We invest heavily in R&D to pioneer next-generation diagnostic reagents, continuously setting new milestones in male reproductive health technology.

footer.description: Professional Provider of Male Reproductive Medical Reagent Solutions
